item.name: Create, credit, and transfer virtual currency between virtual ledgers
Enduser Compliance
item.description: Creates an enduser that breaks a set firewall rule. Resolves the enduser's case in quarantine.

body.raw:
{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
             [rules
               [rule :missing-city [let [address [get-canonical-address enduser]]
                                     [if [nil? address]
                                       missing-data
                                       [if [not-contains? address :address/city]
                                         missing-data]]]]
               [rule :country-is-not-germany
                 [let [address [get-canonical-address enduser]]
                   (if [contains? address :address/country]
                     (if [contains? #{\"GBR\"} [get [get address :address/country] :country/iso3]]
                       quarantine))]]]"
                       }
